article:
Mr. Read and his wife had a small bar  near a train station. The bar didn't close _ 12:00 at night because people came to drink when they were  _  for trains. So the business was good.
About at two o'clock one morning, a man was still  _ at the table in the bar. He was _ Mr. Read's wife wanted to go to bed. She looked  _ the man many times, but the man kept  _ . At last she went to her  _ and said to him. "You have tried to wake the man some times, and he isn't   _ .Why haven't you sent him away? It is too  _ . "
"Oh, no, I don't want to send him away," he answered  _ a smile, "you know, each time I woke him up, he gave me five dollars. Then he went to sleep again."
